Title: Requires certain colleges and universities vet all information displayed on their websites and marketing materials to ensure the information is accurate and impartial
Summary: Requires certain colleges and universities vet all information displayed on their websites and marketing materials to ensure the information is accurate and impartial.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring certain colleges and universities vet all information displayed on their websites and marketing materials to ensure the information is accurate and impartial
